attributes.action: Grant Captain Tom Moore (99 year old Veteran) a Knighthood
attributes.background:
Captain Tom Moore has been a inspiration to the nation during the CoVid-19  pandemic; raising in excess of 12 Million pounds for the NHS in a matter days.
His quiet determination, has shown the world the true quality of our nations population to stand up for it's self and what is right.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
